description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

linkAccount.description: The account which with the source account (the cash pool key) has the sweep relationship.Depending on the rule entered , the link  will either debit or credit the source account.

rule.description: A rule is assigned to a product and the rule determines whether a customer can buy that product or hold it after changes in circumstance.

frequency.description: Specifies the frequency in which the payment application(periodic payments) execute the payment instruction.

minimumDebitsToTransfer.description: Used to restrict the creation of sweep amount for a small amount. The amount entered here will get validated against the sweep amount and only when the sweep amount is greater than this, sweep takes place.

minimumCreditsToTransfer.description: Used to restrict the creation of sweep amount for a small amount.The amount entered here will get validated against the sweep amount and only when the sweep amount is greater than this, sweep takes place.

schedule.description: Indicates where this pool may be run either online or End of the day.

narratives.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

mainAccount.description: The Account that is defined as the Main Master on AC.CP.GROUP.PARAM. This will be defaulted by the system on entering the GROUP.ID and is not user accessible.

sequenceNumber.description: The sequence in which this cash pool record will be processed within the group.

sweepCancelDate.description: Holds the end date for the sweep record. The record will become inactive after this date, which means that no sweep will be executed after this date.

suspensionStartDate.description: Holds the start date for suspending the sweep. No sweep will be done between this date and the date defined in SUSP.END.DATE.

suspensionEndDate.description: Holds the start date for suspending the sweep. No sweep will be done between this date and the date defined in SUSP.END.DATE.

suspendIndefinite.description: To suspending the cashpool for indefinite period.

counterBookingSweepAccount.description: Counter Booking Account for the ID Account.This Account is used by the system to raise an equal and opposite entry posted against ID Account.

counterBookingLinkAccount.description: Counter Booking Account for the Link Account. This Account is used by the system to raise an equal and opposite entry posted against Link Account.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.
